frontmatter.title: Get hourly count of movie reviews
frontmatter.mysql:
select DATE_FORMAT(review_created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') as hour, count(*)
FROM movie_reviews
GROUP BY hour
ORDER BY hour;
frontmatter.postgres:
select DATE_FORMAT(review_created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') as hour, count(*)
FROM movie_reviews
GROUP BY hour
ORDER BY hour;
